title: How to Get Flash in Pokémon Yellow

steps.title: Have at least 10 Pokémon in your Pokédex.
steps.content: Have at least 10 Pokémon in your Pokédex.

steps.title: Make sure one of your Pokémon knows the TM Cut because you will need it to get the Flash TM.
steps.content: Make sure one of your Pokémon knows the TM Cut because you will need it to get the Flash TM.

steps.title: Go inside Diglett Cave.
steps.content: Go inside Diglett Cave. It's near the Dock.

steps.title: Go through the whole cave (it's about 150 steps) and exit it.
steps.content: Go through the whole cave (it's about 150 steps) and exit it.

steps.title: Keep going south until you see trees that you can cut.
steps.content: Keep going south until you see trees that you can cut.

steps.title: Cut them down and walk through.
steps.content: Cut them down and walk through.

steps.title: Keep going until you see a guy standing in front of a building.
steps.content: Keep going until you see a guy standing in front of a building. He should be in a white lab coat with glasses.

steps.title: Talk to him, and he'll give you the HM Flash.
steps.content: Talk to him, and he'll give you the HM Flash. Flash can be used in battle to lower the opponent's accuracy and can be used outside of battle to light dark caves and tunnels, such as Lavender Town's Rock Tunnel.
